name: A concise but descriptive name of the dataset
description: An extended, free-text description of what's in the dataset, who created it, and other attributes
license: This work is licensed under a  Creative Commons Attribution (CC-BY) 4.0 License
citation: Citation to other work relevant to this dataset
Citation to other work relevant to this dataset
Citation to other work relevant to this dataset
measurementTechnique: The URL to or text about the methods, technique or technology used to generate this Dataset

variableMeasured.name: Name of a variable in the dataset
Name of a variable in the dataset

provider.legalName: Legal Name of Organisation which generated the dataset
provider.name: Other Name of Organisation which generated the dataset

subjectOf.description: Describe the event which is the subject of this dataset. For example, a cruise ID.
subjectOf.name: Concise and descriptive name of the Event

potentialAction.name: Concise but descriptive name of action that was part of an Event. For example, the name of a CTD cast
agent: Name or permanent ID of person or thing that performed this action
Name or permanent ID of person or thing that performed this action
Name or permanent ID of person or thing that performed this action

instrument.name: The name of the instrument used in the action. For example, the specific model of a CTD, a glider, a moored sensor
instrument.description: Extended description of the sampling instrument
